long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Power Up Your Inbox with Inbox2Action a.k.a. Inbox2Notion!

Transform your Gmail into organized action items

‚úîÔ∏èSimplified Workflow
No more copying and pasting. Convert Gmail emails directly to Notion tasks, leads, and more without the fuss. Visualize your emails with clarity and quickly discern what needs your attention at a glance.

‚úîÔ∏èEnhance Your Gmail Inbox
See Notion properties like status, due date, and assignee right in your Gmail.  

‚úîÔ∏èDelegate with Ease, Right from Your Inbox
Assign emails smoothly, add insightful notes, and boost your productivity.  

‚úîÔ∏èStay in Sync, Stay in Control: No more 'out of sight. out of mind'.  With our smart labels, now every important email stays in sync with your workflow.  

‚úîÔ∏èComments Lead to Action: See and reply to comments directly from your inbox.

Getting Started Is Easy
Just install the extension and login with your Notion account!

üíå Join Us in the Inbox2Action Community on Discord
Your feedback will shape Inbox2Notion's future.
https://community.inbox2notion.com

Have a suggestion or need help? 
Reach out to us at help@inbox2notion.com or visit our help center at https://help.inbox2notion.com.

Try Inbox2Notion for free - currently in beta.
